title: [Rolton Pens, Common Grazing]
description: Overlapping one another, bright yellow triangles of canvas provide shelter to the wedge-shaped pen that is filled with blue-green grass and grazing sheep.  White picket fencing keeps the ovine denizens from wandering away, while baskets of sweet grass hold their attention.  Bells strung from green and red ribbons mark the entry gate, which leads back to the central viewing area of the glade.
